member.name: HELPWININFO
member.summary: Contains the size and position of either a primary or secondary Help window. An application can set this information by calling the function with the HELP_SETWINPOS value.

member.name: HELPWININFO.wStructSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: HELPWININFO.x
member.summary: X-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the window, in screen coordinates.

member.name: HELPWININFO.y
member.summary: Y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the window, in screen coordinates.

member.name: HELPWININFO.dx
member.summary: The width of the window, in pixels.

member.name: HELPWININFO.dy
member.summary: The height of the window, in pixels.

member.name: HELPWININFO.wMax
member.summary: Options for display of the window. It can be any of the values that can be specified in the nCmdShow parameter for the function.
